title: Books
policy: Every file should be named as <first-name> <last-name> - <title>.json, where title is in the language the books was written in, e.g. GÃ¼nter Grass - Die Blechtrommel.json. Any link that exists in a different translation/edition should be still in this file with a comment

title: Movies
policy: File should have the name of original title. If there was more than one, then it's up to a person adding the move to the database
